document.full_text: a charitable group backed by pop star madonna has scrapped its plan to build a school for impoverished girls in malawi due to mismanagement, the new york times reported on thursday.
document.title: madonna-backed group ends plans for malawi school
lines_and_colors: a charitable group backed by pop star madonna has scrapped its plan to build a school for impoverished girls in malawi due to mismanagement, the new york times reported on thursday.
